p.k: When the Bears' beloved laptop breaks, they finally have the need to do something they've never done before: get jobs. / Panda bears have a very adorable (and violent!) sneeze, and our Panda is no exception. When a video of his sneeze goes viral, Panda becomes a “cute” sensation. / Panda becomes the alpha bear, and he and Grizz have to deal with the consequences of an emotional Panda being the leader of the three Bears. / When a hipster grocery store clerk shames the Bears for asking for plastic grocery bags, the Bears realise that eco-friendly tote bags are their way of gaining acceptance.
